archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.6.1: A governance model should be established to ensure that ICS, and the environments in which they operate, are protected in line with the level of risk to the organisation and its risk appetite. This governance model should focus on the:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
